org.jLOAF.sim.complex

Class WeightedMean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jLOAF.sim.ComplexSimilarityMetricStrategy
      • org.jLOAF.sim.complex.WeightedMean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, SimilarityMetricStrategy

    public class WeightedMean
extends ComplexSimilarityMetricStrategy
    This method calculates the weighted mean based on the weights of each feature. The weights are applied to the similarity between each feature and added to the total.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateWeightedSimilarity

        public double calculateWeightedSimilarity()
        Calculates the weighted similarity based on the features weights. Adds to the total and divides by the size of the keyset()
